remarks: Transfer less-than relation from one atom to another.  (Contributed by NM, 7-May-2012.)
statement:
atlelt.b $e |- B = ( Base ` K ) $.
atlelt.l $e |- .<_ = ( le ` K ) $.
atlelt.s $e |- .< = ( lt ` K ) $.
atlelt.a $e |- A = ( Atoms ` K ) $.
atlelt $p |- ( ( K e. HL /\ ( P e. A /\ Q e. A /\ X e. B ) /\ ( P .<_ X /\ Q .< X ) ) -> P .< X ) $.
